attributes.action: publicly acknowledge that Frasier has left the building
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For an undue length of time the greater public's appreciation of tossed salad & scrambled eggs has lain idle. Together we must join in celebration, or else we won't know what to do with this tossed salad & scrambled eggs.

They're calling again.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
